00049 /**
00050  * @brief Class for computing hilo qc metric from a cel set of cel files.
00051  */

00094   /**
00095    * Loop through the probesets provided and calculate a contrast value
00096    * for each one using the median of PM probes for A allele and B
00097    * allele. (CES constrast space)
00098    * @param cel - Cel File to get data from.
00099    * @param chrXProbeSets - Probesets to process (should be chrX non-pseudo autosomal).
00100    * @param contrastValues - Contrast values vector to be filled in.
00101    */
00102   static void fillInContrastValues(int celIx,
00103                                    std::vector<ProbeList> &probeSets,
00104                                    std::vector<double> &contrastValues,
00105                                    double k = 2);

00107    * Calculate contrast values
00108    */

00110 //                                    affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData* celB,
00111 //                                    const ProbeSet* ps,
00112 //                                    const double k = 2);

00116    */

00118                                   double &peak1,
00119                                   double &peak2,
00120                                   double &peak3,
00121                                   double emThresh = 0.05);
